channel.title: ReRoll
channel.description:
[url]https://rerollgame.com/[/url]
... and people think GTA V is big.

Read full topic

item.title: ReRoll
item.dc:creator: k3nny1550
item.description:
I do wish the game part of the game wasn’t top-down. The Earth is awesome, give me a freely rotating camera.

Of course, if they did that, it would be impossible to use all of that data and stream it with good draw distance without a server farm.

Even so, it sounds like top-down DayZ with geographic data, which is a waste of the potential. They should stand apart and do something new with the map design. Maybe a sci fi Oregon Trail or something. I’d totally make that game.

Read full topic

item.title: ReRoll
item.dc:creator: Orpheon
item.description:
Flatline:

If you read the link they answer all of these questions. The areas they CAN’T go for political or geographical reasons will be procedurally generated. The initial plan or BLOCK ONE as they refer to it, will be a single suitably covered country.

Oh, well that makes sense. Where is that? I don’t see like an FAQ or anything.

EDIT: Nvm I’m blind.

So it is a bit more reasonable than it seems at first. It’s definitely interesting but I think I’ll just watch and see what happens. I’m not dying to play a game like this, but the real world mapping data is interesting. Wonder if they could maybe make that data available to other companies or modders to use in other games.

Read full topic

item.title: ReRoll
item.dc:creator: pfannkuchen_gesicht
item.description:
yeah, doesn’t sound really appealing to me. All that scanning for that crap, that’s what I call a waste of time and work.

Read full topic

item.title: ReRoll
item.dc:creator: Flatline
item.description:
Orpheon:

So would I, but it seems REALLY ambitious. What are they gonna do about places like North Korea or the Amazon, where people can’t go or where aerial mapping is all but useless? What about the vast expanses of Asia and Africa? Who’s gonna go out into the wild and map all that? If they can’t get it all, which seems likely, are there just gonna be huge chunks of the world walled off? Why not start with, like, a single small country as a proof of concept first? Assuming they’re for real and this isn’t a scam, of course.

If you read the link they answer all of these questions. The areas they CAN’T go for political or geographical reasons will be procedurally generated. The initial plan or BLOCK ONE as they refer to it, will be a single suitably covered country.

Read full topic

item.title: ReRoll

Some people are calling scam on that.

Personally, whether it is a scam or not, I’m not seeing a future to it.

item.title: ReRoll
item.dc:creator: Crypt
item.description:
For a minute there I thought someone was making an open-world sandbox game with scanned countries and the setting or something.

So it’s a basic-looking RPG with the selling point being that they scanned the Earth for a background with wasted detail? Shame.

Read full topic
